page.title: 03HOUSING, KIRKELLA/WILLERBY
page.content: Housing survey: General summary. This area is a very popular suburb of the city of Hull.The majority of houses are privately owned and the area contains a wide choice in the size , style and price of houses . There are a number of large Georgian and Victorian houses, some old cottages now renovated but most of the houses are traditional "semis" built just before and just after the 1939-45 war.In the last ten years several new private developments have been started in this area and are continuing. Even the terraced houses are not of the traditional type.They are built in blocks of eight with gardens and garage access.House prices varied from Â£25000 for a terraced house to Â£175000 for a 7 bedroomed, detached house standing in 4 acres of land.
